WorkItem.Description:
NumberLiteral with NumberFlags.AllowSign crashes when encounters + or - that are not followed by a number.
The reason is that it creates an empty Body and then crashes when trying to convert it to a number.

I'll upload a patch with test cases to the Source Code section.
WorkItem.Summary: Signed NumberLiteral crashes on '-' and '+' operators

Comments.Message: It seems that Patches do not support Subversion-style patches, so I'll add it here.
